Dal Makhni.ingredients: Urad dal, Rajma, Butter, Cream, Tomatoes, Garlic, Ginger, Spices
Dal Makhni.steps:
1. Soak dal and rajma overnight
2. Pressure cook until soft
3. Make tadka with garlic, ginger, tomato
4. Add cooked dal, simmer with cream and butter

Aloo Jeera.ingredients: Potatoes, Cumin seeds, Turmeric, Green chili, Salt
Aloo Jeera.steps:
1. Boil potatoes and cut into cubes
2. Heat oil, add cumin seeds
3. Add potatoes and spices
4. Stir-fry and serve hot

Shahi Paneer.ingredients: Paneer, Cream, Cashew paste, Onions, Tomatoes, Spices
Shahi Paneer.steps:
1. Make paste with onion, tomato, cashew
2. Cook with spices and cream
3. Add paneer and simmer

Mix Veg.ingredients: Carrot, Beans, Peas, Cauliflower, Spices, Ghee
Mix Veg.steps:
1. Chop vegetables
2. Stir-fry in ghee
3. Add spices and cook until tender

Butter Chicken.steps:
1. Marinate chicken
2. Cook in butter
3. Add tomato puree and cream
4. Simmer

Aloo Naan.steps:
1. Make dough
2. Fill with mashed potato mix
3. Roll and cook on tawa

Biryani.steps:
1. Cook rice and meat/veg separately
2. Layer and cook on low flame

Sooji ka Halwa.steps:
1. Roast sooji in ghee
2. Add sugar water mix
3. Cook until thick

Sarson ka Saag.ingredients: Sarson leaves, Palak, Makki flour, Spices
Sarson ka Saag.steps:
1. Boil greens and blend
2. Cook with garlic, onion, makki flour
3. Serve with makki roti

Matar Paneer.steps:
1. Fry paneer
2. Make gravy
3. Add peas and paneer
4. Cook for 10 mins
